name: Unique Identity
description:
Unique Identity is a stealth game based around the idea of kidnapping/escaping your kidnappers. The game is only playable with a controller,  as mouse input is not enabled within the game.

When a group of criminals known as ‘The First Ones’ decide to kidnap a man who’s appeared on the news for the past three months and helping the police put an end to criminal organizations, they leap into action and swiftly take the man and hold him hostage without alerting the police.

As the hostage, you're tasked with finding objects hidden around the house that stand out and might help you escape. You'll have to find: Flashlight, Matches, Baseball bat, Journals, and a first aid kit. Good luck.

Controls:
X - Pick-up item
RB - Flashlight
Back button - Restart (When the game over is brought up)
Joysticks - movement/viewing
